UNAUTHORIZED.message: The username or password are incorrect, please login again.

JWT_EXPIRED.message: The JWT authorization token is invalid or expired

FORBIDDEN.message: You don't have permission to access this resource

SERVER_ERROR.message: An error occurred, please try again or contact the support team.

EMAIL_ALREADY_USED.message: The email is already used by another user.

ERROR_SHORT_URL_UNIQUE.message: This url is already used, please choose another url.

NOT_ACTIVE_SUBSCRIPTION.message: In order to complete the operation, a subscription will be required. Please choose a subscription plan available in the Subscription section.

SUBSCRIPTION_MAX_LIMIT.message: You have reached the upper limit for your current plan. Please purchase a subscription suitable for your needs from the Subscription section.
